description: Sum of Lucas (A000032) and Pell (A000129) numbers.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,0,-3,-1).
maple: gfpell := x/(1-2*x-x^2): gfluc := (2-x)/(1-x-x^2): s := series(gfpell+gfluc, x, 100): for i from 0 to 60 do printf(`%d,`,coeff(s,x,i)) od:
crossrefs: Cf. A000032, A000129, A001932, A226638 Product of Pell and Lucas numbers.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 05 2001
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 06 2001
